title: WAR TREAD (ex-FACTORY REVOLT)
genre: THRASH METAL / GROOVE METAL / BEATDOWN HARDCORE
description: A radical left-wing, anti-war project created after the demise of my previous, unsuccessful project. The music is a mix of thrash and groove metal, hardcore, and punk. The project remained largely unnoticed, but for me, it represented a step forward lyrically and production-wise. It also served as my way of reflecting on the world around me, preventing me from going crazy. The project was shut down and renamed War Tread, where I released just one demo recording with two tracks.

title: exhum0
description: A beatmaking project in the style of old-school hip-hop and boom-bap. I used samples from Soviet, Baltic, Caucasian, and Western European jazz bands to create the beats. I closed the project because I didn't have the time to work on it.

title: GOODFELLAH PROD.
description: A new milestone in my hip hop career. I want to make old school hip hop, like in the 90s. It's a reinterpretation of old experiences and a balance between hip hop culture and metal.
